text: "Too Much Heaven" is a 1978. It was written by Barry, Robin and Maurice Gibb. It was performed by the Bee Gees. The band released as a single from their 15th studio album Spirits Have Flown and went to number 1 in Argentina, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Italy, New Zealand, Norway, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland and the United States and number 2 in France, Ireland and the Netherlands, number 3 in Portugal and the United Kingdom, number 4 in Finland and number 5 in Australia and China. It was covered by Jordan Hill in 1996. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Bee Gees songs Category:Beverley Knight songs Category:Paul McCartney songs Category:Robin Gibb songs
title: Too Much Heaven
